3274423793.given_title: react-grid-layout/react-grid-layout: A draggable and resizable grid layout
3274423793.excerpt: React-Grid-Layout is a grid layout system much like Packery or Gridster, for React. Unlike those systems, it is responsive and supports breakpoints. Breakpoint layouts can be provided by the user or autogenerated.

3528383223.given_title: How to Build Reusable Components with Props in React
3528383223.resolved_title: How to Build Reusable Components with Props in React
3528383223.excerpt: Props are one of the most important building blocks of React.js. When you need to pass data down from a parent component to a child component, props make this possible. In this article we'll learn how to work with props and build reusable components in React.
